transcript.title: PM 107/1967 - Australian Representation at Inaugration of President of the Republic of Viet Nam
transcript.content:
P. M. No. 107/ 1967

The Prime Minister, Mr. Holt, announced today thatÂ the Rt. Hon. Paul Hasluck, ( Minister for External Affairs)Â would lead a Special Mission to Saigon to represent AustraliaÂ at the inauguration of the President of the Republic of VietÂ Nam on 30th October.

Sir James Plimsoll ( Secretary to the Department ofÂ External Affairs) will accompany the Minister.

CANBERRA
19th October, 1967
